headline: Video: Why Schwab Isn’t Interested in Offering Prediction Markets
summary: With Robinhood and Coinbase jumping into prediction markets this year, more financial players have tied their growth to products once associated with sports gambling. Charles Schwab is one brokerage firm happy to stay on the sidelines.

headline: How Schwab’s Expanded Trader Tools and New Futures Lineup Will Impact Charles Schwab (SCHW) Investors
summary: Earlier this week, Charles Schwab announced past enhancements to Schwab.com, Schwab Mobile, and thinkorswim®, adding advanced research tools, extended-hours valuation views, expanded options functionality, and 17 new futures products including gold and Solana contracts. The breadth of these platform and product upgrades, combined with expanded in-branch trader support, underscores Schwab’s push to serve increasingly active retail and derivatives traders within a unified ecosystem. We’ll now...
